data.short_description: [Overlay] Overlay still provides you with Notifications even when "Disable Notification" is true for Streamer Mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable Streamer Mode - Enable the "Disable Notifications" for Streamer mode (Note all the other settings work correctly in overlay) - Open a game with lovely overlay enabled. - Get a Notification from someone, and notice the notification show in game.
